item.title: United Polyfab Gujarat Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Shares of United Polyfab Gujarat Ltd surged to hit the upper circuit limit on 24 Dec 2025, reflecting robust buying interest and a maximum permissible daily gain of 5%. The garment and apparel sector stock closed at ₹26.30, marking a 4.77% rise on the day, significantly outperforming its sector and broader market benchmarks. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Mcleod Russel India Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Mcleod Russel India Ltd witnessed robust buying interest on 24 Dec 2025, hitting its upper circuit limit with a maximum daily gain of 5.0%. The stock closed at ₹46.66, marking a significant outperformance against its FMCG sector peers and broader market indices. This surge was accompanied by a regulatory freeze on further trading, reflecting intense demand that remained unfilled throughout the session. Time: 56 minutes ago
